title: Wilhelm Harreither
text: Wilhelm Harreither (born 27 October 1945) is a retired <a href="Austria">Austria</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="Austria%20national%20football%20team">Austria</a>. He also played for SK Amateure Steyr and <a href="Linzer%20ASK">Linzer ASK</a>.
